UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Probing protein sequences as sources for encrypted antimicrobial peptides.
Literature.Author: Brand GD, Magalhães MT, Tinoco ML, Aragão FJ, Nicoli J, Kelly SM, Cooper A, Bloch C Jr

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Xanthomonas axonopodis pv. glycines ISBF 327(MIC=37µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29313(no activity data)
